import { FC, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { setEditPost } from '../store/data' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' const Myposts: FC = () => { const { myPost, user } = useSelector((state: any) => state.data) const [getDisplay, setDisplay] = useState('block') const key = Object.keys(user) const history = useHistory() const dispath = useDispatch() if (key.length === 0) { history.push('/') } const btnEdit = (result: any) => { console.log(result) dispath(setEditPost(result)) setDisplay('none') } switch (myPost[1]) { case 0: return (
No posts yet
Let's add your first post!
) default: return ( myPost[0].map((result: any) =>
By : {result.infouser.username} Last update : {result.updatedAt} {result.title}
{result.content}
) ) } } export default Myposts
